name: Mode
description: The game mode.

values.name: Singleplayer
values.description: A regular, one player seed

values.name: Multiworld
values.description: A multiplayer settings where players can find each other's items

name: Players
description: For multiworld, how many players are in the game.

name: Distinct Worlds
description: For multiworld, with settings that involve randomness, should the worlds have distinct properties (ER, MQ, price rando...).

name: Goal
description: The objective of the seed. The game will end when the specified goal is reached.

values.name: Any Final Boss
values.description: You can beat either Ganon or Majora.

values.name: Ganon
values.description: You must beat Ganon.

values.name: Majora
values.description: You must beat Majora.

values.name: Ganon & Majora
values.description: You must beat Ganon AND Majora. You can do so in any order.

values.name: Triforce Hunt
values.description: You must collect triforce pieces to win.

values.name: Triforce Quest
values.description: You must collect the three parts of the triforce (Power, Courage and Wisdom) to win. Specific hints will guide you.

name: Triforce Goal
description: The amount of Triforce Pieces that are required to win.

name: Triforce Pieces
description: The total amount of Triforce Pieces in the item pool.

name: Logic
description: The guarantees you have regarding reachability of locations.

values.name: All Locations
values.description: Every location in the game can be reached. The seed can always be completed.

values.name: Beatable Only
values.description: Some items can be placed in locations that are never reacheable. The seed can always be completed.

values.name: No Logic
values.description: Items are placed completely at random. The seed might be unbeatable.

name: Item Pool
description: Change the item pool.

values.name: Plentiful
values.description: One extra copy of every major item. Heart containers only.

values.name: Normal
values.description: The regular item count for each game.

values.name: Scarce
values.description: One less of every major item. No Heart Pieces.

values.name: Minimal
values.description: Only one of each major item. No Heart Pieces or Containers.

name: Generate Spoiler Log
description: Generate an extra downloadable text file with the location of every item in the seed as well as other informations. It is recommended to enable this option.

name: Probabilistic Foolish Hints
description: If you don't know what this is, leave it ON

name: No Plando Hints
description: Prevents items that are part of a plando from being hinted

name: Hint Importance
description: Hints will tell if an item is foolish, sometimes required, or always required

name: Song Shuffle
description: Controls where songs can be obtained, in both games.

values.name: Song Locations
values.description: Only locations that contains songs in the vanilla games will have songs.

values.name: Anywhere
values.description: Songs can be placed anywhere.

name: Gold Skulltula Tokens Shuffle
description: Controls which Gold Skulltulas should conceal items different than Gold Tokens

values.name: No Shuffle
values.description: All Gold Skulltula Tokens will be vanilla

values.name: Dungeons Only
values.description: Only the Gold Skulltulas within dungeons will be shuffled

values.name: Overworld Only
values.description: Only the Gold Skulltulas outside of dungeons will be shuffled

values.name: All Tokens
values.description: Every single Gold Skulltulas will be shuffled

name: Houses Skulltula Tokens Shuffle
description: Controls whether Swamp and Ocean should be shuffled or not

values.name: No Shuffle
values.description: Swamp and Ocean Tokens will be vanilla

values.name: All Tokens
values.description: Swamp and Ocean Tokens can be found anywhere

name: Tingle Maps Shuffle
description: Controls where Tingle Maps are

values.name: Vanilla
values.description: Tingle Maps can be bought at Tingle, in their original locations

values.name: Anywhere
values.description: Tingle Maps will be anywhere

values.name: Starting Items
values.description: Tingle Maps are in your pocket

values.name: Removed
values.description: Tingle Maps are fully removed and cannot be obtained

name: Map / Compass Shuffle
description: Controls where Maps and Compasses can be

values.name: Own Dungeon
values.description: Maps and Compasses will be in their own dungeons

values.name: Anywhere
values.description: Maps and Compasses can be on any location

values.name: Starting Items
values.description: Maps and Compasses will be in Link's Pocket

values.name: Removed
values.description: Fully removed and cannot be obtained

name: Small Key Shuffle (OoT)
description: Controls where Small Keys (for Dungeons) can be in OoT

values.name: Own Dungeon
values.description: Dungeon Small Keys can only be found in their own dungeons

values.name: Anywhere
values.description: Dungeon Small Keys can be found anywhere

values.name: Removed
values.description: Small keys are removed and small key doors are unlocked

name: Small Key Shuffle (MM)
description: Controls where Small Keys (for Dungeons) can be in MM

values.name: Own Dungeon
values.description: Dungeon Small Keys can only be found in their own dungeons

values.name: Anywhere
values.description: Dungeon Small Keys can be found anywhere

values.name: Removed
values.description: Small keys are removed and small key doors are unlocked

name: Hideout Small Key Shuffle
description: Controls where Hideout (Gerudo Fortress) Small Keys can be

values.name: Vanilla
values.description: Hideout Small Keys are always on the guards

values.name: Own Dungeon
values.description: Hideout Small Keys can only be found within Gerudo Fortress INTERIOR

values.name: Anywhere
values.description: Hideout Small Keys can be found anywhere

name: Chest Game Small Key Shuffle
description: Controls where Chest Game Small Keys can be

values.name: Vanilla
values.description: Chest Minigame will behave as in vanilla

values.name: Own Minigame
values.description: Chest Minigame Keys can be found inside the minigame

values.name: Anywhere
values.description: Chest Minigame Keys can be found anywhere

name: Boss Key Shuffle (OoT)
description: Controls where Boss Keys can be in OoT

values.name: Own Dungeon
values.description: Boss Keys can only be in their own dungeons

values.name: Anywhere
values.description: Boss Keys can be found anywhere

values.name: Removed
values.description: Boss keys are removed and boss doors are unlocked

name: Boss Key Shuffle (MM)
description: Controls where Boss Keys can be in MM

values.name: Own Dungeon
values.description: Boss Keys can only be in their own dungeons

values.name: Anywhere
values.description: Boss Keys can be found anywhere

values.name: Removed
values.description: Boss keys are removed and boss doors are unlocked

name: Small Key Ring (OoT)
description: Controls the grouping of keys into keyrings, for OoT

values.name: Disabled
values.description: Small keys are found individually, like in the base game.

values.name: Key Rings
values.description: Small keys are grouped into key rings.

name: Small Key Ring (MM)
description: Controls the grouping of keys into keyrings, for MM

values.name: Disabled
values.description: Small keys are found individually, like in the base game.

values.name: Key Rings
values.description: Small keys are grouped into key rings.

name: Silver Rupee Shuffle
description: Make silver rupees items that can be shuffled.

values.name: Vanilla
values.description: Silver Rupees are vanilla

values.name: Own Dungeon
values.description: Silver Rupees are found within their own dungeon

values.name: Anywhere
values.description: Silver Rupees are shuffled in the item pool

name: Silver Rupee Pouches
description: Turn every set of silver rupees into a single item.

name: Town Stray Fairy Shuffle
description: Controls where the Clock Town Stray Fairy can be

values.name: Vanilla
values.description: The Clock Town Stray Fairy will be at its original locations

values.name: Anywhere
values.description: The Clock Town Stray Fairy can be found anywhere

name: Dungeon Chest Fairy Shuffle
description: Controls where the Chest Dungeon Stray Fairies can be

values.name: Starting
values.description: Start with the fairies

values.name: Vanilla
values.description: The Dungeon Stray Fairies will be at their original locations

values.name: Own Dungeon
values.description: All Dungeon Stray Fairies are shuffled within their own dungeon

values.name: Anywhere
values.description: All Dungeon Stray Fairies are shuffled anywhere

name: Dungeon Freestanding Fairy Shuffle
description: Controls where the Freestanding Dungeon Stray Fairies can be

values.name: Removed
values.description: Start with the fairies, and the bubbles are removed.

values.name: Starting
values.description: Start with the fairies

values.name: Vanilla
values.description: The Dungeon Stray Fairies will be at their original locations

values.name: Own Dungeon
values.description: All Dungeon Stray Fairies are shuffled within their own dungeon

values.name: Anywhere
values.description: All Dungeon Stray Fairies are shuffled anywhere

name: Ganon Boss Key Shuffle
description: Controls where Ganon Boss Key should be

values.name: Removed
values.description: Ganon Boss Key is removed, and so is the lock on the door leading to Ganondorf

values.name: Vanilla
values.description: Ganon Boss Key will be in its original chest, within Ganon's Castle

values.name: Ganon's Castle
values.description: Ganon Boss Key will be anywhere within Ganon's Castle

values.name: Anywhere
values.description: Ganon Boss Key can be found anywhere

name: Dungeon Reward Shuffle
description: Controls where the dungeons rewards should be

values.name: Dungeon Blue Warps
values.description: Only the blue warps will grand the rewards

values.name: Dungeons (Max one per dungeon)
values.description: Anywhere in dungeons (one max)

values.name: Dungeons (Unrestricted)
values.description: Anywhere in dungeons

values.name: Anywhere
values.description: Can be anywhere

name: Scrub Shuffle (OoT)
description: Should Business Scrubs in OOT shuffled? If not, the one in Hyrule Field by Lake Hylia fences, the one by the Bridge in Lost Woods and the front one in the grotto near Sacred Forest Meadow will still be shuffled

name: Scrub Shuffle (MM)
description: Shuffle the three business scrubs that sells regular items in MM

name: Cow Shuffle (OoT)
description: Should playing Epona's Song near cows in OOT give an item?

name: Cow Shuffle (MM)
description: Should playing Epona's Song near cows in MM give an item?

name: Shop Shuffle (OoT)
description: Controls whether or not shops in OOT should have their items shuffled

values.name: None
values.description: All the items are vanilla

values.name: Full
values.description: All 8 items are shuffled

name: Shop Shuffle (MM)
description: Controls whether or not shops in MM should have their items shuffled

values.name: None
values.description: All the items are vanilla

values.name: Full
values.description: All 8 items are shuffled

name: Owl Statue Shuffle
description: Make owl statue items that can be shuffled.

values.name: None
values.description: Owl statues are vanilla

values.name: Anywhere
values.description: Owl statues are shuffled in the item pool

name: Pots Shuffle (OoT)
description: Controls whether or not the pots are shuffled (OoT). !!!!! MQ NOT INCLUDED YET !!!!!

name: Pots Shuffle (MM)
description: Controls whether or not the pots are shuffled (MM).

name: Grass Shuffle (OoT)
description: Controls whether or not the grass is shuffled (OoT)

name: Grass Shuffle (MM)
description: Controls whether or not the grass is shuffled (MM)

name: Ocarina Shuffle (OoT)
description: Controls whether or not the two Ocarinas in OoT are shuffled

name: Master Sword Shuffle
description: Controls whether or not the Master Sword is shuffled amongst all the items

name: Gerudo Card Shuffle
description: Controls whether or not the Gerudo Membership Card is shuffled amongst all the items

name: Merchants Shuffle (MM)
description: Shuffle extra merchants in MM

name: Weird / Pocket Egg Content Shuffle
description: Fun setting: should using the Weird/Pocket Eggs give an item? If not, they're entirely removed from the game

values.name: Affordable
values.description: All prices are set to 10 rupees.

values.name: Vanilla
values.description: All prices are set to their vanilla values.

values.name: Weighted Random
values.description: All prices are randomized, but lower prices are favored.

values.name: Random
values.description: All prices are randomized.

name: OoT Shops Prices
description: Sets the price of items inside OoT shops

values.name: Affordable
values.description: All prices are set to 10 rupees.

values.name: Vanilla
values.description: All prices are set to their vanilla values.

values.name: Weighted Random
values.description: All prices are randomized, but lower prices are favored.

values.name: Random
values.description: All prices are randomized.

name: OoT Scrubs Prices
description: Sets the price of items sold by OoT scrubs

values.name: Affordable
values.description: All prices are set to 10 rupees.

values.name: Vanilla
values.description: All prices are set to their vanilla values.

values.name: Weighted Random
values.description: All prices are randomized, but lower prices are favored.

values.name: Random
values.description: All prices are randomized.

name: MM Shops Prices
description: Sets the price of items sold inside MM shops

values.name: Affordable
values.description: All prices are set to 10 rupees.

values.name: Vanilla
values.description: All prices are set to their vanilla values.

values.name: Weighted Random
values.description: All prices are randomized, but lower prices are favored.

values.name: Random
values.description: All prices are randomized.

name: MM Tingle Prices
description: Sets the price of items sold by Tingle

name: Ganon Trials
description: Enables or disables the trials in Ganon's Castle

values.name: None
values.description: Trials are not required to enter the tower

values.name: All
values.description: All trials are required to enter the tower

name: Starting Age
description: Choose the starting age

values.name: Child
values.description: Link will start off as child

values.name: Adult
values.description: Link will start off as adult

values.name: Random
values.description: Link will start off as either adult or child, with a 50/50 probability

name: Door of Time
description: Alters the Door of Time state

values.name: Closed
values.description: The Door will be closed, and you will need to play Song of Time in front of the Temple of Time altar to open it. (The Spiritual Stones are NOT needed)

values.name: Open
values.description: The Door is already open

name: Age Change upon Song of Time

values.name: None
values.description: Cannot change age by playing Song of Time.

values.name: Ocarina of Time
values.description: Can change age by playing Song of Time with the Ocarina of Time specifically.

values.name: Always
values.description: Can always change age by playing Song of Time.

description: Allows you to switch ages by playing Song of Time, if you've been to Temple of Time as both ages

name: Deku Tree
description: Alters the Deku Tree state

values.name: Closed
values.description: Mido will block the way to the deku tree until you have a deku shield and the kokiri sword.

values.name: Open
values.description: The deku tree will be open from the start

name: Deku Tree as Adult
description: Allows access to the Deku Tree as adult.

name: Well as Adult
description: Allows access to the Well as adult.

name: Fire Temple as Child
description: Allows access to the Fire Temple as child.

name: Kakariko Gate
description: Alters the Kakariko Gate (leading to Death Mountain Trail) state

name: King Zora
description: Alters the behavior of King Zora in Zora's Domain

values.name: Vanilla
values.description: You will need to present him Ruto's Letter in order to enter Zora's Fountain as both Child and Adult

values.name: Open (Adult Only)
values.description: Already on the side as Adult, leaving Zora's Fountain access free. Child still needs Ruto's Letter

values.name: Open
values.description: He will already be on the side for both Child and Adult, and Ruto's Letter is removed from the game, in favor of an empty bottle

name: Gerudo Fortress
description: Alters the behavior of the Carpenters in Gerudo Fortress

values.name: Vanilla
values.description: You will need to rescue all carpenters.

values.name: One Carpenter
values.description: You will need to rescue only one carpenter.

values.name: Open
values.description: Carpenters are rescued from the start.

name: Skip Child Zelda
description: This changes the beginning of the child trade quest. True means you'll start having already met Zelda and got her item along the one from Impa. And the Chicken is also removed from the game

name: Light Arrow Cutscene
description: Alters how the Light Arrow Cutscene should be triggered

values.name: Vanilla
values.description: Triggers at Temple of Time with Shadow and Spirit Medallions

values.name: Custom
values.description: Triggers at Temple of Time with a special condition

name: Majora Child Requirements
description: Alters the requirements to fight Majora

values.name: None
values.description: As soon as you have access to the Moon you can go fight Majora

values.name: Custom
values.description: You will need to meet a special condition to fight Majora

name: Boss Warp Pads
description: Alters the behavior of the MM Boss Warp Pads.

values.name: Boss Beaten
values.description: Enabled when the boss is beaten

values.name: Remains
values.description: Enabled when the matching remain is obtained

name: Free Scarecrow (OoT)
description: Allows to spawn Pierre the Scarecrow just by pulling the Ocarina out

name: Pre-Completed Dungeons
description: Allow dungeons to be pre-completed depending on rules.

name: Pre-Completed Dungeons (Major)
description: How many major dungeons sould be pre-completed. Can be combined with other pre-completed dungeon rules.

name: Pre-Completed Dungeons (Stones)
description: Pre-completes dungeons containing at least one stone, until it reaches that many stones. Can be combined with other pre-completed dungeon rules.

name: Pre-Completed Dungeons (Medallions)
description: Pre-completes dungeons containing at least one medallion, until it reaches that many medallions. Can be combined with other pre-completed dungeon rules.

name: Pre-Completed Dungeons (Remains)
description: Pre-completes dungeons containing at least one remain, until in reaches that many remains. Can be combined with other pre-completed dungeon rules.

name: Cross-Games OoT Warp Songs
description: Allows you to play OOT Warp Songs from MM to warp to their respective locations. Logic could even expect you to do so

name: Cross-Games MM Song of Soaring
description: Controls whether you can play Song of Soaring from OOT to warp to MM Owl Statues and how logic should be affected

values.name: None
values.description: Song of Soaring is fully disabled in OOT

values.name: Child Only
values.description: Song of Soaring in OOT is enabled, and logic only accounts for Child using it

values.name: Child & Adult
values.description: Song of Soaring in OOT is enabled, and logic accounts for both Child and Adult using it

name: Chest Size Matches Content

values.name: Never
values.description: Chests will be vanilla

values.name: Stone of Agony
values.description: Chests will match content when you have the stone of agony in OoT

values.name: Always
values.description: Chests will always match content

description: Modifies the chests appearance so they match their content. Works for unique items, keys and fairies.

name: CSMC for Heart Pieces/Containers
description: Use a specific texture for heart pieces/containers

name: Extra CSMC
description: Enables CSMC on a wider range of checks

name: Blast Mask Cooldown
description: Changes the cooldown between each explostion of the Blast Mask

name: Clock Speed
description: Alters the speed of the clock. Some options may render seeds unbeatable due to being unable to do time-related checks

values.name: Very Slow
values.description: The time will flow 66% slower than usual

values.name: Slow
values.description: The time will flow 33% slower than usual

values.name: Default
values.description: The normal clock speed

values.name: Fast
values.description: The clock speed will twice as fast than usual

values.name: Very Fast
values.description: USE AT OWN RISK!! - The clock speed will be 3x faster than usual, even on inverted

values.name: Super Fast
values.description: USE AT OWN RISK!! - The clock speed will be 6x faster than usual, even on inverted

name: Fierce Deity Anywhere in MM
description: Controls the ability to use Fierce Deity outside of boss lairs

name: Hookshot Anywhere (OOT)
description: Modifies all surfaces to be hooked onto

name: Hookshot Anywhere (MM)
description: Modifies all surfaces to be hooked onto

name: Climb Most Surfaces (OOT)
description: Modifies most surface to be climbable in OOT

name: Fast Bunny Hood
description: Modifies the Bunny Hood in OoT to give a speed increase

name: Default Hold Target
description: Forces the default target system to HOLD instead of SWITCH

name: Fill Wallets
description: Fills the wallet upon finding a new one

name: OoT Swords
description: Alters OOT Swords behavior

values.name: Separate
values.description: They can be found independently from each other

values.name: Progressive Knife and Biggoron
values.description: Kokiri Sword and Master Sword are independent. However Giant's Knife and Biggoron Sword are progressive.

values.name: Progressive
values.description: Each Progressive Sword will grant you the next one: Kokiri Sword -> Master Sword -> Giant's Knife -> Biggoron Sword

values.name: Full Lullaby Only
values.description: Only the Goron Lullaby can be found, and when playing with Songs on Song Locations, Baby Goron in MM is no longer a Song Location

name: Sun's Song in MM
description: Enables Sun's Song as an item in MM.

name: Fairy Ocarina in MM
description: Functionally identical as the Ocarina of Time, but now there's 2 Ocarinas for Majora's Mask!

name: Blue Fire Arrows
description: Changes the OoT Ice Arrows to have Blue Fire properties

name: Short Hookshot in MM
description: Adds a short hookshot in MM (logic accounts for that). A trick is also there for some of the harder spots

name: Child Wallets
description: Shuffles the starting Wallet... making it so you have to find it to spend anything!

name: Colossal Wallets
description: Adds a Wallet that can hold up to 999 rupees in each game

name: Bottomless Wallets
description: Adds a Wallet that can hold up to 9999 rupees in each game

name: Skeleton Key (OoT)
description: Adds a Skeleton Key that can open every small-key-locked door.

name: Skeleton Key (MM)
description: Adds a Skeleton Key that can open every small-key-locked door.

name: Magical Rupee
description: Adds a Magical Rupee that can triggers ever silver-rupee event.

name: Ocarina Buttons Shuffle (OoT)
description: Adds the Ocarina Buttons as items that are shuffled.

name: Ocarina Buttons Shuffle (MM)
description: Adds the Ocarina Buttons as items that are shuffled.

name: Enemy Souls (OoT)
description: Add enemy souls into the item pool. Enemies won't spawn unless their soul is obtained.

name: Enemy Souls (MM)
description: Add enemy souls into the item pool. Enemies won't spawn unless their soul is obtained.

name: Boss Souls (OoT)
description: Add boss souls into the item pool. Enemies won't spawn unless their soul is obtained.

name: Boss Souls (MM)
description: Add boss souls into the item pool. Enemies won't spawn unless their soul is obtained.

name: NPC Souls (OoT) (EXPERIMENTAL)
description: Add NPC souls into the item pool. NPCs won't spawn unless their soul is obtained.

name: Lenient Goron Spikes
description: Goron spikes can charge midair and keep their charge. Minimum speed for goron spikes is removed.

name: Bombers' Tracker
description: Locks the in-game tracker behind the Bombers' Notebook

name: Coins
description: Enable the leftover coin items, that can be used for special conds

name: Red Coins
description: How many Red Coins to add to the item pool

name: Green Coins
description: How many Green Coins to add to the item pool

name: Blue Coins
description: How many Blue Coins to add to the item pool

name: Yellow Coins
description: How many Yellow Coins to add to the item pool

name: Ageless Swords
description: Allows Link to use swords independently of his age

name: Ageless Shields
description: Allows Link to use shields independently of his age

name: Ageless Tunics
description: Allows Link to use tunics independently of his age

name: Ageless Boots
description: Allows Link to use boots independently of his age

name: Ageless Sticks
description: Allows Link to use deku sticks independently of his age

name: Ageless Boomerang
description: Allows Link to use the boomerang independently of his age

name: Ageless Hammer
description: Allows Link to use the hammer independently of his age

name: Ageless Hookshot
description: Allows Link to use the hookshot independently of his age

name: Ageless Child Trade
description: Allows Link to use the child trade items independently of his age

name: Dungeon Entrance Shuffle
description: Enable the ability to shuffle dungeons within their own game or across both.

name: Shuffle Major Dungeons with Dungeons
description: If turned on, it means the boss-containing dungeons and uninverted Stone Tower Temple will be shuffled.

name: Shuffle OoT Minor Dungeons with Dungeons
description: If turned on, it means Bottom of the Well, Ice Cavern and Gerudo Training Grounds are also shuffled

name: Shuffle Beneath The Well with Dungeons
Shuffle Ikana Castle Interior with Dungeons
Shuffle Major Regions
description:
- Every entrance to Hyrule Field except Market
- The entrance to Gerudo Fortress from Gerudo Valley
- The entrance to Death Mountain from Kakariko
- The entrances to the four main regions in MM
- The entrance to Romani Ranch

name: Shuffle Market Entrance
description: Shuffle Hyrule Field's Market entrance among the regions.

name: Shuffle Regional Shortcuts
description:
Shuffles the various shortcuts between regions.
- Lost Woods/Goron City
- Lost Woods/Zora's River
- Lake Hylia/Zora's Domain
- Lake Hylia/Gerudo Valley
- Ikana Canyon/Southern Swamp

name: Shuffle Interiors
description: Enable the ability to shuffle interiors in their own game or across both games.

name: Shuffle Most Interiors
description: Shuffle most interiors with each other.

name: Shuffle Extra Interiors
description:
Shuffle additional, more complex interiors. These include:
- OOT: Link's House, Temple of Time, Windmill, Kak Potion Shop
- MM: Stock Pot Inn, Astral Observatory/Bombers' Hideout, Swamp Tourist Hut, Ikana Spring Cave

name: Shuffle Warp Destinations

values.name: None
values.description: No Warps are shuffled.

values.name: OOT Only
values.description: Only Warp Songs and Owl Flights can be shuffled between each other.

values.name: MM Only
values.description: Only Owl Statues can be shuffled between each other.

values.name: Own Game
values.description: Warp Songs, Owl Flights, and Owl Statues are shuffled among each other within their own games.

values.name: Full
values.description: Warp Songs, Owl Flights, and Owl Statues are shuffled among each other.

description: Shuffle the Warp Songs and Owl Statues among each other.

name: Shuffle Child Owl Flights
description: Shuffle the two owl flights among the other warps.
